QueryResult.text: select prchargecode.prid odf_pk, NVL(PRChargeCode.PRID,0) as charge_code_key, NVL(PRChargeCode.prExternalID,'0') as charge_code_id, NVL(PRChargeCode.prName,'0') as charge_code, prchargecode.prIsOpen as is_active, prchargecode.prModTime as clarity_updated_date from prchargecode prchargecode where 1 = 1
